moves.2... Qf6: It is not wise to move with the queen into the open board so early in the game. Theory recommends 2... Nf6 and black equalize pretty soon.
moves.3. Nf3 Bc5 4. O-O Qg6: ???? a huge mistake. black leaves the e5  pawn and loses the f7 pawn afterwards. 4... d6 with Bg4 later on was inquired.
moves.5... Qg5: in this poor situation I think 5... Qb6 was a slight better.
moves.6. Nxf7 Qg6: why? White takes the rook and the queen will still be threatened...
moves.7. Nxh8 Qg5 8. d4: white is practically won. 8. Bxg8 works too.
moves.8... Qe7 9. dxc5 Nf6 10. Bg5: it's somehow amazing. black didn't develop any piece... at all...
